item.title: CVE-2023-3486|2024-08-02T06:55:03.589Z -- papercut -- papercut%20ng
item.description: An authentication bypass exists in PaperCut NG versions 22.0.12 and prior that could allow a remote, unauthenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files to the PaperCut NG hostâ€™s file storage. This could exhaust system resources and prevent the service from operating as expected.
